trans-unit.source: Contains multiple modules related to management of content
trans-unit.target: Contient plusieurs modules liés à la gestion de contenu

trans-unit.source: This module contains the overview of all elements within the current workspace and it enables to continue the review and publishing workflow for them.
trans-unit.target: Ce module contient une vue d'ensemble de tous les éléments dans l'espace de travail actuel et vous permet de poursuivre le travail de révision et de publication.

trans-unit.source: This module allows managing of media assets including pictures, videos, audio and documents.
trans-unit.target: Ce module permet la gestion des ressources multimédias, y compris les images, vidéos, audio et des documents.

trans-unit.source: Contains multiple modules related to administration
trans-unit.target: Contient plusieurs modules associés à l'administration

alt-trans.target: Contient plusieurs modules associés à l'administration

trans-unit.source: The User Management module provides you with an overview of all backend users. You can group them by their properties so you are able to monitor their permissions, filemounts, member groups etc.. This module is an indispensable tool in order to make sure the users are correctly configured.
trans-unit.target: The User Management module provides you with an overview of all backend users. You can group them by their properties so you are able to monitor their permissions, filemounts, member groups etc.. This module is an indispensable tool in order to make sure the users are correctly configured.

trans-unit.source: The Package Management module provides you with an overview of all packages. You can activate and deactivate individual packages, import new packages and delete existing packages. It also provides you with the ability to freeze and unfreeze packages in development context.
trans-unit.target: The Package Management module provides you with an overview of all packages. You can activate and deactivate individual packages, import new packages and delete existing packages. It also provides you with the ability to freeze and unfreeze packages in development context.

trans-unit.source: The Sites Management module provides you with an overview of all sites. You can edit, add and delete information about your sites, such as adding a new domain.
trans-unit.target: The Sites Management module provides you with an overview of all sites. You can edit, add and delete information about your sites, such as adding a new domain.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to customize your backend user profile. Here you can change your active system language, name and email address. You may also configure other general features in the system.
trans-unit.target: This module allows you to customize your backend user profile. Here you can change your active system language, name and email address. You may also configure other general features in the system.
